articles.description: Nathan Lyon hopes to make a big impression for Lancashire, but the Australia great has unfinished Ashes business too.
articles.title: Nathan Lyon: Australia spinner on Ashes, Bazball, Lord's and Lancashire

articles.description: Rory McIlroy calls for the split world of professional golf to find "a compromise" that brings a sense of unity.
articles.title: PGA Tour: Rory McIlroy says golf can learn from NI peace process

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe will have dreamed that his final Champions League act as a Paris St-Germain player would have been lifting the trophy at Wembley. The reality was very different.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe suffers final PSG failure in the Champions League

articles.description: BBC Sport visits Spain to find out why Real Madrid have radically remodelled their iconic Bernabeu stadium, as they aim to stay ahead of the competition in European football.
articles.title: The new Bernabeu: Can Real Madrid's stadium keep them at the top?

articles.description: Natalie Robyn leaves her position as chief executive officer of motorsport’s governing body the FIA after just 18 months in the role.
articles.title: Formula 1: Natalie Robyn leaves role as FIA chief executive officer after just 18 months

articles.description: BBC Sport's F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following Lando Norris' win at the Miami Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Norris, Newey, Magnussen, McLaren - your questions answered after Miami GP

articles.description: The Olympic flame arrives in Marseille amid an "unprecedented level of security," 79 days before the opening ceremony of the Paris Games.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Torch arrives in France amid 'unprecedented security'

articles.description: Frenchman Benjamin Thomas takes a surprise victory in Lucca on stage five of the Giro d’Italia as Tadej Pogacar retains his overall lead.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Cofidis' Benjamin Thomas wins stage five as Tadej Pogacar retains lead

articles.description: England centre Manu Tuilagi will miss playing for England as he prepares to leave Sale Sharks for Bayonne in France.
articles.title: Bayonne-bound Manu Tuilagi will miss playing for England

articles.description: Real Madrid won the La Liga title at the weekend, but defender Dani Carvajal says there were no celebrations as they target the Champions League final.
articles.title: No title party for Real before Bayern - Carvajal
